attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cadbury's create 1000s of jobs for local people in Birmingham as well contributing greatly to the local community.  Cadbury's is one of Britain's last manufacturing success stories.  The demise of Rover affected the lives of many Midlands people so please don't let's make the same mistake again and keep Cadbury's British.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
